description:
This module covers aspects of operations and maintenance for typical infrastructure and facilities.
Major topics include the organization of O&M teams; resource deployments; O&M contracts & execution; management; insurances; use of various systems related to building works/ mechanical/electrical/ plumbing/ fire protection; and O&M management systems.
title: Infrastructure Operations and Maintenance
